main event: A witness observed an unidentified object over the Potomac River that appeared to come from the direction of the airport and then seemed to settle into the river.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a crescent shape and emitted a halo of light,The sighting lasted approximately 8 minutes and involved 4 objects observed at the same time,The report suggested the objects were misidentified as the star Antares due to a conjunction with the moon,The witness conducted a search for physical evidence at the presumed landing spot,The sky condition was day with the sun positioned behind the observer.
sighted object: crescent-shaped object with a bright point source of light
witness description: male, provided detailed observations and participated in a search for evidence
